system.description: The character uses their element to snare a target.
system.effect: The character makes an Ego attack against a target's Melee defense within 5 spaces times the character's rank. If the attack is a success, the character grabs the target with their element. On a Fantastic success, the target can also be pinned and suffers the element's special effect. Breaking free requires a successful Melee check against target number 20.
